constituent: attitude, ability, elbow, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, spoon, sitting on the ground, heart, spoon2, sitting on the ground2
koohiiStory1: This guy has an attitude problem – lots of ability, but his heart´s not in it.
koohiiStory2: Having a good attitude means believing in your heart that you have the ability to do anything - like memorizing more than 2000 kanji, for example.
words:
形態(けいたい): form, shape, figure
実態(じったい): truth, fact
態勢(たいせい): attitude, conditions, preparations
態々(わざわざ): expressly, specially, doing something especially rather than incidentally
事態(じたい): situation, present state of affairs, circumstances
状態(じょうたい): current status, condition, situation, circumstances, state
態度(たいど): attitude, manner
